plot: The Mayan Prophecy countdown to 21 Dec 2012. What is the truth behind the date and who was the man that created it.
title: 2012: The Mayan Prophecy

plot_en: The Mayan Prophecy countdown to 21 Dec 2012. What is the truth behind the date and who was the man that created it.
